headline: VP & Head of Procurement ◆ Strategic Sourcing Executive ◆ Procurement Transformation ◆ Category Management ◆ Source-to-Pay Optimization ◆ Speaker
about:
A high-performing sourcing and procurement executive. Accomplished in building and leading S&P organizations and business transformations, with a wealth of experience deploying strategies to mitigate risk, executing complex enterprise-wide projects, and streamlining processes to enhance quality and organizational value. Recognized for creating value and fostering expertise in category management, optimizing costs, and cultivating collaborative relationships with stakeholders. A trusted leader, adept in transforming and improving the maturity of the S&P functions to deliver best-in-class results consistently.

• 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 & 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Transformed multiple S&P organizations, creating substantial value and improving return on invested capital while enhancing team skillsets, efficiency, quality, and improving on all metrics; led the supplier transition for the MetLife P&C acquisition while boosting the team’s influence across the organization and unlocking tens of millions in new value

• 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐞-𝐭𝐨-𝐏𝐚𝐲 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Led numerous successful optimizations in source-to-pay utilizing the Coupa system; co-led a major source-to-pay initiative to streamline Coupa and improve utilization, which included supplier enablement, electronic invoicing, PO-backed invoicing, supplier onboarding, supplier risk management, contracting, change management, and internal awareness

• 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞: Created hundreds of millions in savings, enabled higher revenues, improved supplier quality and services provided, partnered with business leaders to improve budgets and spend ROI, managed and reduced risks, improved DEI and ESG efforts, created meaningful and measurable value; achieved an S&P department ROI of 10


Executive Leadership | Strategic Planning | Operational Effectiveness | Procurement Transformation | Spend Management | Strategic Sourcing | Procurement Operations | Category Management | Contracting + Negotiation | CLM | Coupa | S2P + P2P | Supplier Risk Management | Logistics | Supply Chain | Budget Management | Forecasting | DEI Advocate | Project + Change Mgmt.
Show less
reason: The profile aligns with the target as the person holds a senior procurement role (VP & Head of Procurement) and has extensive experience in strategic sourcing and procurement transformation. However, information about the person's location and the size of their company is missing, which are key criteria in the target description.

headline: Team Builder and Manufacturing Supply Chain Professional - solving operational issues in manufacturing supply chain
about:
Dynamic and results-driven Supply Chain Leader with a proven track record in manufacturing across regulated medical devices, pharmaceuticals, biopharmaceuticals, and cell and gene therapy industries. Expert in implementing SAP R/2, R/3, and QAD systems to streamline operations and enhance efficiency. A strategic mentor who fosters high-performing teams, accelerating growth and leadership development.

Demonstrated success in orchestrating supply chain strategies that optimize procurement, manufacturing, and distribution management. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams to drive operational excellence and improve productivity. Adept at risk mitigation and executing end-to-end supply chain strategies, ensuring seamless pipeline management and proactive supply planning.
Show less
